dct_title_s: دولة البحرين = The State of Bahrain / ادارة المساحة بوزارة الإسكان والزراعة (Sheet 3)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by contours and spot heights. Depths shown by gradient tints. "Original photogrammetric compilation by Fairy Surveys Ltd. Subsequent revision by the Survey Directorate, Ministry of Housing, Kingdom of Bahrain"--On some sheets. Map shows municipal boundaries, pipe, electricity, telegraph lines, cementeries, places of worship, quarries. includes index to adjoining sheets.
dct_publisher_sm: Bahrayn : Dār Akhbār al-Khalīj al-Ṭibāʻah wa-al-Nashr, 1977-1992.
